content: Just landed back in NYC after Japan. The city feels so different now. Time to unpack and reflect.
raw_content: Just landed back in NYC after Japan. The city feels so different now. Time to unpack and reflect.

content: The jet lag is real, but so is the inspiration from Japan. Starting to sketch again, blending tech and art.
